Title: Stole a Badge
Plot: Earl tackles No. 127 on his list by making amends for pilfering a police officer's badge. When he discovers that the theft resulted in the cop's demotion, he tries to get the officer reinstated.
GuestStars: Max Perlich,  Alan Conn,  Mike O'Malley,  Clint Howard,  William Stanford Davis,  Steve Seagren,  Laura Johnson,  Kerry O'Malley,  Joe Kay,  Joan M. Blair,  Helen Siff,  Abdoulaye N'Gom
